test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_logical
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: boolean
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: AND
            conditions:
              - operation: EQUALS
                subject: 10
                value: 10
              - operation: GREATER_THAN
                subject: 20
                value: 15
